definition: to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: Salts is a medicine that causes movements of the bowels .
sentences.chinese: 瀉鹽是一種促使腸子運動的藥物。

sentences.english: Try taking nice hot bath with Epsom salts to help relieve some of your back pain.
sentences.chinese: 試試用瀉鹽好好洗個熱水澡，對減輕背痛很有效的哦。
